description.english: Complete your first game
Win a game using each colour train at least once
Win a game without any uncompleted tickets
Win against 4 Easy bots in one game
Play 10 games
Win a game without drawing any extra tickets
Complete 25 tickets
Complete your last ticket on your final turn
Draw a completed ticket on your final turn
Play 50 games
Complete 125 tickets
Win against 4 Normal bots in one game
Win a game while only completing tickets that reward 10 or more points
Win a game without claiming any 6 length routes
Win after being last before scoring tickets and longest route
Win against 4 Hard bots in one game
Win without using any locomotive cards
Play 100 games
Complete 250 tickets
On the North America map, keep all 3 starting tickets and complete them all
On the North America map, win without having the longest route bonus
On the North America map, earn the longest route bonus with a 45 train continuous route
On the North America map, win a game in which you claim seven 6 length routes
On the North America map, win a game in which you complete a destination ticket on three consecutive turns
On the North America map, win without completing any tickets
Win on the Europe map without using any stations
Complete 7 tickets in one game on the Europe map
Win a game on the Europe map without keeping your long ticket
Finish a game with 2 or more other players using stations to borrow your routes
Win a game on the Europe map while using all 3 stations to complete tickets
Win a game on the Europe map with 150 points or more

Claim Murmansk to Lieksa 10 times
Win with a network that connects Honningsvag and Kobenhavn
Win with a network that connects Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Estonia, and Russia
Win a game on the Nordic Countries map without claiming any tunnels
Claim Murmansk to Lieksa using 9 of the same colour cards
In a USA: Big Cities game, win while entirely blocking off one Big City.
In a USA: Mega Game, win by completing your 5 initial Tickets and no others.
In a USA: Mega Game, win while connecting all of the Canadian cities.
In a USA: 1910 game, win the Globetrotter bonus card while completing at least 10 Tickets.
In a USA: Big Cities game, win while connecting all 7 Big Cities.
In a USA: Mega Game, win with a score of 300 or more.
In a Mega Europe game, win while keeping and completing a Long Route Ticket.
In a Europe Expanded game, win while claiming at least 5 Tunnels.
In a Big Cities of Europe game, win while connecting at least 5 of the 9 Big Cities.
In a Big Cities of Europe game, win while claiming at least 5 Ferry routes.
In a Mega Europe game, win while only completing Tickets worth less than or equal to 10 points.
In any Europa 1912 game mode, claim the 8-length Tunnel route 5 times.
Form a Mandala that includes Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur
Win on the India map while stopping all opponents from scoring a Mandala bonus
Form your first Mandala
Form a Mandala that uses at least two ferry routes
Win on the India map without a Mandala bonus
Win on the India map while earning a 40 point Mandala bonus
Win while creating a network that connects Moscow, Omsk, Irkutsk and Vladivostok
Win a game while only using Mountain and Ferry routes
Win a game without winning the Asian Explorer bonus
Win while claiming the silk road by connecting Tbilisi, Samarkand, Xiâ€™an and Shanghai

Win the Asian Explorer bonus while connecting at least 20 cities
Connect The Embarcadero, Market Street, The Castro and Twin Peaks in one game.
On San Francisco, claim all 3 Ferry Routes in a 2-player game.
On San Francisco, end the game with all 20 Train Pieces used and no Train Cards in hand.
On San Francisco, win while collecting all 7 Tourist Tokens in one game.
On San Francisco, win without completing any Tickets.
On San Francisco, win with a score of 60 or more.
On Switzerland, win while connecting all four surrounding countries
On Switzerland, complete 18 Tickets in one game
On Switzerland, connect France to Osterreich using only tunnels, but without using Locomotive cards
On Switzerland, win a 2-player game without failing any Tickets
On Switzerland, win having drawn 5 Tickets that were already complete. They can be non-consecutive
On Switzerland, in a 3-player game, win by completing 8+ more Tickets than both opponents
In Japan, complete 25 Tickets that enter the Tokyo subway
In Japan, connect Kokura to Hakodate using any combination of regular and bullet train routes.
In Japan, run out of personal trains before running out of bullet trains.
In Japan, build no Bullet Train routes and still win the game.
In Japan, in a 2-player game, have your Ticket completed by an opponent building a Bullet Train route.
In Japan, win the 25-point Bullet Train Bonus in a 5-player game.
In Africa, win a game while doubling points for 6+ Desert & Savanna routes
In Africa, win a game while doubling points for 6+ Jungle & Forest routes
In Africa, win a game while doubling points for 6+ Mountain & Cliff routes
In Africa, connect Nigeria, Tchad and Sudan in a single game
In Africa, use terrain cards to claim Durban-Madagascar in 5 different games
In Africa, win 5 games against 4 Hard AI
In Germany, win a game while having claimed at least two 7-length routes
In Germany, win a 4 player game while having collected more Passengers than any other player.
In Germany, win a game while connecting at least 3 other countries.
In Germany, win a 4 player game while having the most Passengers of at least 3 different colours.
In Germany, win a game while having completed at least 5 Long Tickets.
In Germany, win a 3 or 4 player game while having collected all 10 Passengers of a single colour.
In Poland, win a game while connecting at least 4 other Countries.
In Poland, win a 4 player game while having collected the most points from Country Bonuses
In Poland, win a 2 or 3 player game while having completed only the starting Destination Tickets
In Poland, win a 2 player game while collecting at least 3 Country Bonuses from the same Country
In Poland, win a 3 or 4 player game without connecting to any Country
